TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 宽叶薹草 ( 原变种) kuan ye tai cao (yuan bian zhong)

treatment.description: Leaf blade glabrous at margins, glabrous adaxially and sparsely pilose on veins abaxially. All spikes androgynous. Utricle glabrous.
treatment.distribution: Needle-leaved and broad-leaved mixed forests and forest margins or broad-leaved forests; 1000–2000 m. Anhui, Hebei, Heilongjiang, Jiangxi, Jilin, Liaoning, Shaanxi, Shandong, Shanxi, Zhejiang [Japan, Korea, Russia (Far East)].
